msg.lift.setcorner: Set first corner of the Elevator to %s
msg.lift.toobig: You cannot make an Elevator this big.
msg.lift.noblock: You need to have %s Elevator blocks in your inventory to make an Elevator of this size.
ttinfobook.json: {pages:["[\"\",{\"text\":\"Welcome the ThutTech Manual.\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\nThe following pages will describe how to create and operate an elevator system.\",\"color\":\"none\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Getting Started\",\"color\":\"dark_green\"},{\"text\":\"\\n\\nThe first thing you will need to do, is craft several Elevator Blocks, Two or more Elevator Control Blocks, and a Device Linker.\",\"color\":\"none\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"To start with, build the structure which you want to convert into the Elevator.\\n\\nThen right click the first corner of it with your Device Linker, It should get outlined in \"},{\"text\":\"red\",\"color\":\"red\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Next, sneak and right click the other corner, the selected red box will be converted into the Elevator.\\n\\nIf you do not have enough Elevator blocks, it will fail to create, and will tell you how many you need.\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Next Shift-Right-Click the elevator with the Device Linker.  This will bind the linker to the Elevator.\\n\\nIf you wish to remove the Elevator, shift right click it with a stick, and it will convert back into the blocks it was made from.\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Next place the Control Blocks.\\n\\nThe Control Blocks need to be placed 2 blocks above where the Elevator should stop.\\n\\nRight click the face of the block that you want buttons on with the Device Linker.\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Right clicking again with the Linker will cycle through the 4 different pages of buttons.\\n\\nIf you right click the face with a stick, it will toggle that face on and off.\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"Control Blocks which are physically touching will be linked to the same floor.\\n\\nYou can make a Controller block into a call controller by shift right clicking the face with an unlinked Device Linker.\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"To actually Link the Elevator to the block, shift right click the number you want that floor to be with the Device Linker, and that block will be assigned as that floor.\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"To then use, right click the required floor with empty hand, or any item that is not the Device Linker or Stick.\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"You may also put chests or Controller Blocks in your Elevator.\\n\\nIf you place a controller block in it, make sure to enable the face before creating the Elevator.\"}]","[\"\",{\"text\":\"The Control Block is compatible with OpenComputers, and has the following Methods available:\\n\\nsetFloor(number)\\ngetFloor(number)\\ncallFloor(number)\\ncall(X/Y/Z)Value(number)\\nget(X/Y/Z)Value()\\ngetFloorYValue(number)\"}]"],title:"ThutTech Manual",author:Thutmose}
